# German Articles Quiz

## Question 1
What is the definite article for "Mann" (man)?
- die
- das  
- der ✓
- den

## Question 2
Which article goes with "Mädchen" (girl)?
- die
- das ✓
- der
- dem

## Question 3
Complete: ___ Haus ist groß (The house is big)
- die
- das ✓
- der
- dem

This quiz focuses on German definite articles (der, die, das).
